ValidationRule.description: Ratio must be in format X/Y to be valid
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(COMM_OfficialEntityRatio__c)), OR( NOT(REGEX(COMM_OfficialEntityRatio__c, "^[1-9]/[1-9]$")), VALUE(LEFT(COMM_OfficialEntityRatio__c, FIND("/", COMM_OfficialEntityRatio__c) - 1)) > VALUE(RIGHT(COMM_OfficialEntityRatio__c, LEN(COMM_OfficialEntityRatio__c) - FIND("/", COMM_OfficialEntityRatio__c))) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Value for ratio isn't in the correct format (X/Y)
